narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This inspection was conducted to ensure compliance with the regulations and standards of the Animal Welfare Act
(AWA) at the licensee's new site; site located in Davie, Florida.  Based on this inspection, and the finding of no
non-compliant items as required by the AWA, the new site is approved.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
